definition: qualities that are comparable, to examine and note the similarities or differences of
details:
noun
- qualities that are comparable
= synonyms: comparison
verb
- to examine and note the similarities or differences of
= example: to examine and note the similarities or differences of
- to consider or describe as similar, equal, or analogous
= example: to consider or describe as similar, equal, or analogous
= synonyms: equate, liken
- to form the comparative or superlative form on an adjective or adverb
= example: to form the comparative or superlative form on an adjective or adverb
- to be akin or comparable
= example: to be akin or comparable
